page.title: 13THE WAR MEMORIAL ART GALLERY
page.content: The Art Gallery/War Memorial occupies an imposing site at the junction of Greek St. and Wellington Rd. At present there are approximately three hundred and seventy pictures in the Gallery. The oldest dates from 1790. However, the most famous and expensive work of art is{Crowther Street, {Stockport}by the late{L.S.Lowry.}The permanent exhibition also contains many works by local artists and seventeen sculptures. The Gallery has many temporary exhibitions throughout the year and these form the major part of the displays. The Gallery is open from 11am until 5pm each weekday and from 10am until 4pm on Saturdays.
